import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Avatar, Menu } from 'antd'; import { LogoutOutlined, EditOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; const { SubMenu } = Menu; const styles = { menuItem: { float: 'right', borderLeft: 'thin solid #3d505f', }, logoItem: { borderBottom: 'none', }, header: { backgroundColor: '#243c50', color: '#fff', }, }; const TopBar = ({ user }) => { return (
{user && user.user.username.charAt(0).toUpperCase()} {' '} {user && user.user.username.toUpperCase()} )} > Reset Password Logout
); }; TopBar.propTypes = { user: PropTypes.object.isRequired, }; export default withRouter(TopBar);
